name: modular-dashboard
description: Modular grid-based dashboard for small displays

scripts.dev-prod: cp config.json dist/config.json && cp -r modules dist/modules && node dist/server.min.js
scripts.minify: npm run minify:server && npm run minify:app
scripts.postminify: sed -e 's/app.js/app.min.js/g' public/index.html > dist/public/index.html && cp public/styles.css dist/public/styles.css
